short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Not mistakenly, but edit Production records when you need it. Take Control of Save button in Prod.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salesforce Record Protector, tool is made to prevent unintentional edit in Production. 
Salesforce Devs/QA/BA works in  multiple orgs at a same time. Many times, unintentionally, instead of, edit in Sandbox users update records in Production. Which then becomes a serious issue as per data breach policy.'

Managing Tabs color is not sufficient to prevent such event, hence moving forward this tool remove Save button and enable on demand.
